response.overview: Shi Yan, an optimistic and cheerful young woman who loves traditional Chinese martial arts, trains under coach Wang Mingyang and dreams of opening her own martial arts school. As they practice together, their mutual admiration blossoms into love, and they share a blissful romance.  However, Wang Mingyang aspires for more than just being a martial arts instructor. He seeks fame by attempting to summit Kawagarbo - the unconquered highest peak of Meili Snow Mountain - planning to gain internet fame through a live broadcast. Unbeknownst to him, Shi Yan suffers from uterine fibroids and breast fibroadenomas, though she never finds the courage to tell him. Instead, she tries to dissuade him by citing the mountain's dangers.
response.title: Forget Me
